iitb.CRF
Interface Feature

All Known Implementing Classes:
FeatureImpl
public interface Feature

A single feature returned by the FeatureGenerator needs to support this interface.

Author:
Sunita Sarawagi

Method Summary

          can be -1 if the feature is a state, rather than an edge feature
